name: Screen-Looper
description:
Escape the Maze! You loop around the screen while it is locked. Can you use this to your advantage?

Controls:

- WASD - move

- Left Mouse Button - shoot

- Right Mouse Button - lock/unlock screen

Made for Ludum Dare 47
